title: Fact Check: Nita Ambani did not tweet about government’s expenditure on Hajj pilgrimage | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A screenshot of a tweet attributed to the chairperson of Reliance Foundation, Nita Ambani is being shared on social media. The tweet highlights the expenditure on Hajj pilgrimage by the government.

At the time of filing this post, it was shared by 18,000 people.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found it to be fake.

We checked the Twitter handle mentioned in the screenshot and found that it is of a fan page.

We also noticed that the account was created in April 2020. It was also noted that Nita Ambani does not have a Twitter account.

In conclusion, it is clear that viral tweet has falsely been attributed to Nita Ambani.
